summary: This document is an email correspondence discussing the closing of accounts and a wire transfer initiated on February 25, 2014. Janet Young from J.P. Morgan Private Bank is confirming the wire transfer details to Richard Kahn of HBRK Associates Inc. and is awaiting a response from Lisa Hurd at Deutsche Bank regarding the receipt of funds.

persons.name: Janet E. Young
persons.context: Janet E. Young is confirming the details of a wire transfer and is in communication with Richard Kahn regarding account closings.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is inquiring about the status of funds in their account and is communicating with Janet Young regarding the wire transfer.

persons.name: Lisa Hurd
persons.context: Lisa Hurd is mentioned as a contact to track down the receipt of the funds from the wire transfer.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is noted to be out of the office on the day of the correspondence.

persons.name: Gina Magliocco
persons.context: Gina Magliocco is listed as an alternate contact for Janet Young.

persons.name: Jason Grosse
persons.context: Jason Grosse is also listed as an alternate contact for Janet Young.

connections.description: Janet Young is providing account information and assistance to Richard Kahn regarding the wire transfer.
Janet Young is reaching out to Lisa Hurd to confirm the receipt of funds from Deutsche Bank.
Richard Kahn is aware that Amanda Kirby is out of the office, indicating a working relationship.

events.title: Wire Transfer Initiation
events.description: A wire transfer was initiated from J.P. Morgan Private Bank to Hyperion Air, Inc. for the amount of $100,067.96.

locations: 575 Lexington Avenue, 4th Floor, New York, New York 10022
keyFacts: A wire transfer of $100,067.96 was initiated on February 25, 2014.
Janet Young is awaiting a call back from Lisa Hurd at Deutsche Bank regarding the receipt of the funds.
Amanda Kirby was out of the office on the day of the correspondence.
Richard Kahn is inquiring about the status of the funds in their account.
The correspondence includes multiple contacts at J.P. Morgan Private Bank.
